actions.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Kildee.

description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to authorize $1 million for fiscal year 2021 for the creation of a tool on EPA's website to help people understand testing results for their well water and connect them to local health and government resources.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to authorize $1 million for fiscal year 2021 for the creation of a tool on EPA's website to help people understand testing results for their well water and connect them to local health and government resources.
